metadata.title: CVE-2024-56667 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/i915: Fix NULL pointer dereference in capture_engineWhen the intel_context structure contains NULL,it raises a NULL pointer dereference error in drm_info().(cherry picked from commit 754302a5bc1bd8fd3b7d85c168b0a1af6d4bba4d)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-56667` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
